QuestData.Title: Hard to Swallow
QuestData.Description: Those troops are sure to be needin' a hefty supply of food in their bellies.$B$BI'll let you in on a little secret that a squeamish $r like you would never know... those jormungar worms taste just like chicken.$b$bGo provoke one of those giant hulking jormungar to the east. You're not likely to be able to kill one straight out, so just toss this down its throat when it opens its mouth wide. Bring me back as many of the slabs of meat as you can tote.
QuestData.LogDescription: Battle a Hulking Jormungar east of Nozzlerust Post until it opens its mouth, then throw a Potent Explosive Charge into its throat. After it explodes, collect 6 slabs of Seared Jormungar Meat off of the ground and bring them back to Xink.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did ya get it all? You certainly stink of it.
QuestData.RewardText: Ha ha! One of those meat slabs landed clear over here! Nice work there!
